#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int dsod(int x)
{
    int sum = 0;

    while (x != 0) {
        if (x % 2)
            sum += (x % 10);

        else
            sum += (2 * (x % 10));

        x /= 10;
    }

    return (sum % 10);
}

int main()
{
    int t;

    cin >> t;

    while (t--) {
        int a, b;
        int t1, t2;

        cin >> a >> b;

        if (a != 0)
            a -= 1;

        t1 = 0;
        while (a % 10) {
            t1 += dsod(a);
            a -= 1;
        }

        t1 += (45 * (a / 10))+ dsod(a);

        t2 = 0;
        while (b % 10) {
            t2 += dsod(b);
            b -= 1;
        }

        t2 += (45 * (b / 10)) + dsod(b);

        cout << t2 - t1 << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
